channel.title: Hugo on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My Blog

item.title: How to use Hugo
item.description: This is how you use Hugo to write a new post! ## Step 1: Install Hugo You can install Hugo by following the instructions on the [Hugo installation page](https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/). ## Step 2: Create a new site You can create a new Hugo site by running the following command in your terminal: ```bash hugo new site my-hugo-site ```
